cell.html: *newly created from villages Šaštín and Stráže nad Myjavou in 1960 , 1960 - 1971 called Šaštínske Stráže

context.text: List of towns in Slovakia - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Slovak name German name Hungarian name Population Remarks

(Note that the German or Hungarian are used by the respective ethnic minorities and the Hungarian names are used in Hungary . In communities where the ethnic minority represents 20% or more of the population, the minority has a wide range of cultural and linguistic rights.)
This list of cities and towns shows the Slovak names first, then the historical German name, then the historical Hungarian name, and finally the town's population as of 2006 (31. 12.).
This is a list of cities and towns in Slovakia . For a list of municipalities in Slovakia see the List of municipalities and towns in Slovakia .
List of villages and municipalities in Slovakia List of cities
^ Population on 31st December 2006 by municipalities, Statistical Office of the Slovak Republic
